titles: On the much lamented death of the valiant Major William Cockburn, who died at Stonie-flet, June 6. 1683. A funeral elegie / N. Paterson.
author: Paterson, Ninian, d. 1688.
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
